title.value: Прогнозирование профессиональной успешности и безопасности операторов мобильной сельскохозяйственной техники
Prediction of professional success and security of mobile agricultural machinery drivers
Prediction of professional success and security of mobile agricultural machinery drivers

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Orlova, Yu.A., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: The objective prerequisites for professional  injuries and accidents appear the inevitable human interaction with the high-performance equipment operating at high power loads, pressures, speeds, temperatures, levels of noise, dust, vibration and radiation. The main factor of occupational injuries in agriculture, as with severe and fatal, is the impact on employee of moving and rotating elements of technical tools, and the most traumatic (23% of all accidents in agriculture with severe and fatal) is the profession of operator of mobile agricultural machinery - tractor-machinist, mechanic, combiner. The key to successful work of operators of mobile agricultural machinery is a thorough knowledge of the technological process of equipment's work, requirements of the production exploitation of technical means, their facilities and occupational safety. The model of professional success and safety of operators of mobile agricultural machinery is developed. Their gradation on successfully and conditionally suitable depending on psycho-physiological factors is justified.
